title: Spicy honey salmon
methods: Heat oven to 200C/fan 180C/gas 6. Zest and juice the lemon, then mix the zest and half the juice with the spice, garlic, half the spring onions and 2 tsp oil. Season well.
Put the salmon into a shallow dish, spoon over the marinade, then leave for 10 mins to let the flavours mingle.
Meanwhile, put the couscous in a large bowl. Tip in the remaining lemon juice, oil and spring onions. Add boiling water to cover the couscous, then cover and leave to stand.
Lift the salmon onto a foil-lined baking tray, spoon over any leftover marinade, then roast for 15 mins. With 5 mins to go, pull out the baking tray and spoon the honey over each fillet.
Add the mint to the couscous and fluff it up with a fork. Serve the salmon with the couscous, spoon over the juices from the baking tray and add lemon wedges.
description: The fish doesn't need to marinate for long to take on all the Moroccan flavours in this dish.
